articles.author: Shawna Chen
articles.title: Asian Americans flex their voting power in San Francisco school board recall - Axios
articles.description: The recall effort was largely driven by Asian American parents who were discontent with the board's delay in reopening schools.
articles.content:
Asian Americans proved themselves to be a critical voting bloc this week as San Francisco overwhelmingly voted to remove three school board members from office.

articles.author: Greg Wyshynski
articles.title: Canada prevails vs. rival Team USA to win women's hockey gold at Beijing Olympics - ESPN
articles.description: Canada reclaimed women's ice hockey gold from the Americans with a 3-2 victory Thursday at the Beijing Olympics in the latest thrilling chapter of the sport's greatest rivalry.
articles.content:
Canada defeated archrival Team USA to win women's ice hockey gold Thursday at the Beijing Olympics in the latest thrilling chapter of the sport's greatest rivalry.

articles.title: Two of the men convicted of killing Ahmaud Arbery used racist slurs in messages, a witness testifies at their federal hate crime trial - CNN
articles.description: Texts and social media messages from two of the White men convicted of murdering Ahmaud Arbery included racist insults about African Americans, an FBI intelligence analyst testified Wednesday in their federal hate crime trial in Georgia.
